original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)
analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 16.19. Kusalattika, Cittasaṁsaṭṭhaduka
Kusalaṁ cittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nacittasaṁsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: kusalam citta sasaṭṭham dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na citta sasaṭṭhaḥ dhammo uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ cittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nacittasaṁsaṭṭho dhammo
analyzed: hetu paccayā kusalam citta sasaṭṭham dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na citta sasaṭṭhaḥ dhammo

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ cittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato nacittasaṁsaṭṭho
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā kusalam citta sasaṭṭham dhammam paṭicca na abyākataḥ na citta sasaṭṭhaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ cittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nacittasaṁsaṭṭho
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā kusalam citta sasaṭṭham dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na citta sasaṭṭhaḥ

original: ca naabyākato nacittasaṁsaṭṭho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ cittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ
analyzed: ca na abyākataḥ na citta sasaṭṭho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā kusalam citta sasaṭṭha

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nacittasaṁsaṭṭho ca naakusalo nacittasaṁsaṭṭho ca dhammā
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na citta sasaṭṭho ca na akusalaḥ na citta sasaṭṭho ca dhammā

original: uppajjanti hetupaccayā … pañca.
analyzed: uppajjanti hetu paccayā pañca

original: Akusalaṁ cittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nacittasaṁsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: akusalam citta sasaṭṭham dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na citta sasaṭṭhaḥ dhammo uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. Akusalaṁ cittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nacittasaṁsaṭṭho dhammo
analyzed: hetu paccayā akusalam citta sasaṭṭham dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na citta sasaṭṭhaḥ dhammo

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Akusalaṁ cittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato nacittasaṁsaṭṭho
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā akusalam citta sasaṭṭham dhammam paṭicca na abyākataḥ na citta sasaṭṭhaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Akusalaṁ cittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nacittasaṁsaṭṭho
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā akusalam citta sasaṭṭham dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na citta sasaṭṭhaḥ

original: ca naabyākato nacittasaṁsaṭṭho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Akusalaṁ cittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ
analyzed: ca na abyākataḥ na citta sasaṭṭho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā akusalam citta sasaṭṭha

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nacittasaṁsaṭṭho ca naakusalo nacittasaṁsaṭṭho ca dhammā
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na citta sasaṭṭho ca na akusalaḥ na citta sasaṭṭho ca dhammā

original: uppajjanti hetupaccayā … pañca.
analyzed: uppajjanti hetu paccayā pañca

original: Abyākataṁ cittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nacittasaṁsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: abyākatam citta sasaṭṭham dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na citta sasaṭṭhaḥ dhammo uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. Abyākataṁ cittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nacittasaṁsaṭṭho
analyzed: hetu paccayā abyākatam citta sasaṭṭham dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na citta sasaṭṭhaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Abyākataṁ cittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā abyākatam citta sasaṭṭham dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ

original: nacittasaṁsaṭṭho ca naakusalo nacittasaṁsaṭṭho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na citta sasaṭṭhaḥ ca na akusalaḥ na citta sasaṭṭhaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate terasa.
analyzed: hetuyā terasa ārammaṇe nava pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate terasa
